original: Christenson, Harald, kyrkoherde, Lerum, f. 16/9/83 i Holsljunga, Älvsb. 1., av kontr :prosten Carl C. o. Valborg Sörman. G. 17 m. Ester Eliida Paulsson. Barn: Maj f. 18, Gerd 19, Bo 23. — Stud:ex. 03, teol. fil. ex. 04, teol. kand. 07, prakt. teol. prov s. å, prästv. 08. Kyrkoh. i Abild 15, i Lerum fr. 24. Ordf. i kyrkofullm., skoilstyr. o. barnav:nd, isuppl. i styr. f. Älvsb. 1. barnav :förb., sekr. i ASP-kiretis. M’edili. av 1883 àr’s^ män. LVO, Mannerheimmed. f. hum. verksamhet.
translated: Christenson, Harald, vicar, Lerum, b. 16/9/83 in Holsljunga, Älvsborgs län, son of district provost Carl C. and Valborg Sörman. Married 17 with Ester Eliida Paulsson. Children: Maj b. 18, Gerd b. 19, Bo b. 23. - Graduated high school 03, theological degree 04, theological candidate 07, practical theological examination the same year, ordained 08. Vicar in Abild 15, in Lerum from 24. Chairman of the church council, school board and children's committee, substitute in the board for Älvsborgs län's children's association, secretary in the ASP church. Medallist of 1883 years' men. LVO, Mannerheim medal for humanitarian work.
